metadata.title: CVE-2022-3577 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory write flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™sKid-friendly Wired Controller driver. This flaw allows a local user tocrash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system. It is inbigben_probe of drivers/hid/hid-bigbenff.c. The reason is incorrectassumption - bigben devices all have inputs. However, malicious devices canbreak this assumption, leaking to out-of-bound write.
